A.name: Standard
A.task_markdown: ### Standard Evaluation\nReview each case and decide if the presented condition is likely using the best of your clinical judgment.
A.guidelines_markdown: 1. Review the patient metadata.\n2. Inspect the image carefully.\n3. Answer Yes if the condition is present, otherwise No.

B.name: AI-Human Comparison
B.task_markdown: ### AI-Human Comparison\nCompare your decision against the AI suggestion shown below the image.
B.guidelines_markdown: 1. Consider the AI hint but rely on your own judgment.\n2. Respond within the allotted time.\n3. Flag the case if unsure using the Skip option.
